title: Cassiopeia Sci-Fi Music Pack
description: Professional and stunning science fiction and cyberpunk music pack.
longDescription:
This pack contains 15 original, well-orchestrated, and catchy tracks for sci-fi and cyberpunk games. Some track has a loopable version and a version with an ending. Fight tracks have versions with and without drums, so you can increase and decrease the tension during the game.

These pieces of music are totally stunning and of premium quality.

Please, check the sample on Youtube!

Preview:

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=6GYfUILh9YM
technicalDetails:
Features:

Number of Audio Wavs: 38

24 bit / 44,100 Hz

Does music loop: (Yes)

Minutes of audio provided: 01:02:19

Supported Development Platforms:

Windows: Yes

Mac: Yes
